description: Among the new high-risk regions is Campania where officials say the situation is out of control.
title: Coronavirus: Italy extends 'red zones' as infections soar
title_page: Coronavirus: Italy extends 'red zones' as infections soar - BBC News
maintext: Earlier this year Italy became the epicentre of the pandemic in Europe but brought its outbreak under control with a tough national lockdown. Restrictions were gradually lifted as cases eased but last week - faced with a second wave of infections, it introduced new measures.
